ComicInfo.Title: Vampirella of Drakulon
ComicInfo.Summary:
*Vampirella of Drakulon* "The one, the only, the original-VAMPIRELLA- makes her fantastic debut in this first issue"
Origin of Vampirella
*Death Boat* "A good captain is the last to leave his ship- but what happens when the last person aboard is a terrified girl"
Survivors on a life boat a drift at sea, start being attacked by a vampire and slowly turn on each other trying to figure out who the blood sucker really is.
*Two Silver Bullets* "Sweet, petit Maria has her problems with wolves and silver bullets"
A man hunts the wolf that bit his daughter and changed her into a wolf too.
*Goddess From The Sea* "Artist Neal Adams brings to life a mysterious maiden of mayhem."
A woman from under the sea seeks aid from a man on shore to escape her hunters.
*Last Act: October* "Miss Hortense Pilkington is followed by her family's awful curse."
A woman descended from a witch hunter tries to survive to midnight to break the curse put on her family generations ago.
*Spaced Out Girl* "Excited by the prospect of men on the moon? This story of amazons in outer space will put you in orbit"
A lady's man goes to a planet full of...ladies.
*A Room Full of Changes* "Doom just wont behave- care to enter one and find out why?"
A man buys a new full furnished house, but one room keeps changing and showing your true soul, who would ever build such a house, a murdered man that's who.
*Covers:* 1st position Original Cover with lettering
2nd position cover art without lettering
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-07 09:35:35. [Issue ID 10419]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Billy Graham,Ernie Colon,Frank Frazetta,Frank Frazetta,Michael Royer,Neal Adams,Reed Crandall,Tom Sutton,Tony Tallarico
ComicInfo.Inker: Billy Graham,Ernie Colon,Frank Frazetta,Michael Royer,Neal Adams,Reed Crandall,Tom Sutton,Tony Tallarico
